Classes/TGGeoPolygon.html#/c:objc(cs)TGG.abstract: The array of rings defining this polygon.

Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -initWithCenter:zoom:bearing:pitch:
Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Initialize a camera position with a location and orientation.

Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.name: center
Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The coordinate at the center of the map view.

Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.name: zoom
Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The zoom level of the map view. Lower values show more area.

Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.name: bearing
Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The orientation of the map view in degrees clockwise from North.

Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.name: pitch
Classes/TGCameraPosition.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The tilt of the map view in degrees away from straight down.

Classes/TGCameraPosition.html.name: TGCameraPosition
Classes/TGCameraPosition.html.abstract: A camera position defining a viewpoint for a map.

Classes/TGGeoPolyline.html.name: TGGeoPolyline
Classes/TGGeoPolyline.html.abstract: A shape made of connected line segments.

Classes/TGLabelPickResult.html.name: TGLabelPickResult
Classes/TGLabelPickResult.html.abstract: Data structure holding the result of a label selection that occured on the map view.

Classes/TGMapData.html.name: TGMapData
Classes/TGMapData.html.abstract: A TGMapData enables you to dynamically create map features to be rendered in the current map scene.

Classes/TGMapFeature.html.name: TGMapFeature
Classes/TGMapFeature.html.abstract: A map object defined by a geometry and a set of properties.

Classes/TGMapView.html.name: TGMapView
Classes/TGMapView.html.abstract: TGMapView is a flexible and customizable map view managing the lifecycle of an OpenGL ES map. This view provides

Classes/TGMarker.html.name: TGMarker
Classes/TGMarker.html.abstract: Marker interface that makes you able to add icons, polylines and polygons to the map view.

Classes/TGMarkerPickResult.html.name: TGMarkerPickResult
Classes/TGMarkerPickResult.html.abstract: Data structure holding the result of a marker selection that occured on the map view.

Classes/TGSceneUpdate.html.name: TGSceneUpdate
Classes/TGSceneUpdate.html.abstract: Represents a data structure to specify a YAML path and the corresponding value for a Tangram scene update.
